name: Luugal Portal
text:
Whenever a creature with mana value 3 or less enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn.
{b}{b}{b}{b}{b}: Reveal the top six cards of your library. For each creature card with mana value 3 or less revealed this way, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
